授業目的: This course aims to produce confident speakers of English who feel comfortable in a one-to-one interaction with a native speaker and are able to express their ideas, initiate and understand conversation at an intermediate level. To achieve these goals, a content-based approach to language learning will be adopted, whereby students will be trained to interact with spoken and written texts on issues of global concern.
到達目標: Activities will include group discussions, simulations, case studies and debates, and students will be guided in the preparation of oral presentations. Project work will give practice in topic selection and research, note taking and the planning and writing of mini reports.

第5回: First assignment due. On-demand. Text, unit 4, pp. 39-41.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students are required to prepare for class and (where appropriate) review. They are also required to bring a pen or pencil, paper and a dictionary to class.
